JobGroups.template:
defaults:
  x86_64:
    machine: 64bit
    priority: 50
    settings:
      HDD_1: disk_default_updated.qcow2
products:
  qubesos-*-pull-requests-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: pull-requests
    version: '*'
scenarios:
  x86_64:
    qubesos-*-pull-requests-x86_64: []
#    - system_tests_update_encrypted:
#        testsuite: system_tests_update
#        priority: 10
#        settings:
#          HDD_1: disk_default_%VERSION%_%MACHINE%.qcow2
#          STORE_HDD_1: disk_default_updated.qcow2
#    - aem-tpm1
#    - aem-tpm1-mfa
#    - aem-tpm1-srk
#    - aem-tpm1-srk-mfa
#    - aem-tpm2
#    - aem-tpm2-mfa
#    - aem-tpm2-srk
#    - aem-tpm2-srk-mfa

defaults:
  x86_64:
    machine: 64bit
    priority: 50
products:
  qubesos-4.0-install-iso-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: install-iso
    version: '4.0'
  qubesos-4.1-install-iso-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: install-iso
    version: '4.1'
  qubesos-4.2-install-iso-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: install-iso
    version: '4.2'
  qubesos-4.3-install-iso-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: install-iso
    version: '4.3'
scenarios:
  x86_64:
    qubesos-4.0-install-iso-x86_64:
    - install_minimal:
        machine: mac
        priority: 40
    - install_minimal:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_minimal:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_from_usb:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 15
    - install_from_usb:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_default_upload:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_default:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 15
    - install_iso_file:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_over_existing:
        priority: 15
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 15
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_xfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_xfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 20
    - install_usbvm_combined:
        priority: 10
    - install_no_usbvm:
        priority: 10
    - install_keyboard_layout:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_keyboard_layout:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 20
    - install_locale:
        priority: 20
    - install_unencrypted_upload:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 51
    - install_unencrypted_upload:
        machine: 64bit
    - install_nvme:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_nvme:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_default:
        machine: hw5
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: hw5
    qubesos-4.1-install-iso-x86_64:
    - install_minimal:
        machine: mac
        priority: 40
    - install_minimal:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_minimal:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_minimal_kernel_latest:
        machine: uefi
        testsuite: install_minimal
        priority: 10
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_usb:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_usb:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_default_upload:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_default:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 15
    - install_iso_file:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_over_existing:
        priority: 15
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 15
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_xfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_xfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 20
    - install_usbvm_combined:
        priority: 10
    - install_no_usbvm:
        priority: 10
    - install_keyboard_layout:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_keyboard_layout:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 20
    - install_locale:
        priority: 20
    - install_unencrypted_upload:
        machine: 64bit
    - install_unencrypted_upload:
        testsuite: install_unencrypted_upload
        machine: uefi
    - install_nvme:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_nvme:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_nvme_kernel_latest:
        machine: 64bit
        testsuite: install_nvme
        priority: 10
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_nvme_kernel_latest:
        machine: uefi
        testsuite: install_nvme
        priority: 10
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_default:
        machine: hw1
    - install_default_kernel_latest:
        machine: hw7
        testsuite: install_default
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: hw1
    - install_default:
        machine: hw6
        priority: 10
    qubesos-4.2-install-iso-x86_64:
    - install_minimal:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_minimal:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10

    - install_usb:

    - install_usb:

    - install_default:

    - install_default:

        priority: 15
    - install_iso_file:

        machine: 64bit

        priority: 15
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 15
    - install_btrfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 15
    - install_xfs:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_xfs:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 20
    - install_usbvm_combined:
        priority: 10
    - install_no_usbvm:
        priority: 10
    - install_keyboard_layout:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 20
    - install_keyboard_layout:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 20
    - install_locale:
        priority: 20
    - install_unencrypted_upload:
        machine: 64bit
    - install_unencrypted_upload:
        machine: uefi
        testsuite: install_unencrypted_upload
    - install_nvme:
        machine: 64bit
        priority: 10
    - install_nvme:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_nvme_4kn:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_nvme_512e:
        machine: uefi
        priority: 10
    - install_nvme_kernel_latest:

    - install_nvme_kernel_latest:
        machine: uefi

    - install_default:

    - install_default:
        machine: hw6
    - install_default_kernel_latest:
        machine: hw7
        testsuite: install_default
        settings:
          KERNEL_VERSION: latest
    - install_btrfs:

defaults:
  x86_64:
    machine: 64bit
    priority: 50
products:
  qubesos-*-pull-requests-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: pull-requests
    version: '*'
scenarios:
  x86_64:
    qubesos-*-pull-requests-x86_64:
    - system_tests_update:
        priority: 10
    - install_default_upload:
        machine: hw1
        priority: 60
        settings:
          ISO: Qubes-%VERSION%-stable.iso
          HDD_1: ""
    - system_tests_update:
        machine: hw1
        priority: 10
        settings:
          START_DIRECTLY_AFTER_TEST: install_default_upload
          HDD_1: disk_default_%VERSION%_%MACHINE%.qcow2
          WORKER_CLASS: hw1
    - install_default_upload:
        machine: hw7
        priority: 60
        settings:
          ISO: Qubes-%VERSION%-stable.iso
          HDD_1: ""
    - system_tests_update:
        machine: hw7
        priority: 10
        settings:
          START_DIRECTLY_AFTER_TEST: install_default_upload
          HDD_1: disk_default_%VERSION%_%MACHINE%.qcow2
          WORKER_CLASS: hw7
    - install_default_upload:
        machine: hw13
        priority: 60
        settings:
          ISO: Qubes-%VERSION%-stable.iso
          HDD_1: ""
    - system_tests_update:
        machine: hw13
        priority: 10
        settings:
          START_DIRECTLY_AFTER_TEST: install_default_upload
          HDD_1: disk_default_%VERSION%_%MACHINE%.qcow2
          WORKER_CLASS: hw13
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui
    - system_tests_network
    - system_tests_backup
    - system_tests_pvgrub_salt_storage
    - system_tests_extra
    - system_tests_backupcompatibility
    - system_tests_whonix:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_gui_tools:
        priority: 40
#    - system_tests_manager
    - system_tests_suspend:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_splitgpg
    - system_tests_dispvm
    - system_tests_devices
    - system_tests_gui_interactive:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_guivm_gui_interactive:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_guivm_vnc_gui_interactive:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_kde_gui_interactive:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_guivm_gpu_gui_interactive:
        machine: hw13
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_xfs
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_btrfs
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_ext4
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_zfs
    - system_tests_audio
    - system_tests_usbproxy
    - system_tests_qrexec
    - system_tests_qrexec_perf:
        machine: hw1
    - system_tests_storage_perf:
        machine: hw1
    - system_tests_network_ipv6
    - system_tests_network_updates
    - system_tests_misc
    - system_tests_backupdispvm
    - system_tests_audio:
        machine: hw1
    - system_tests_gui_interactive:
        machine: hw1
#    - system_tests_guivm_gui_interactive:
#        machine: hw1
    - system_tests_whonix:
        machine: hw7
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_qwt_win10:
        machine: hw13
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_qwt_win10_seamless:
        machine: hw13
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_qwt_win11:
        machine: hw13
        priority: 40
#    - system_tests_qwt_win7:
#        machine: hw1
#        priority: 40
    - system_tests_gui_tools:
        machine: hw7
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui:
        machine: hw7
    - system_tests_suspend:
        machine: hw1
        priority: 40

defaults:
  x86_64:
    machine: 64bit
    priority: 50
products:
  qubesos-*-templates-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: templates
    version: '*'
scenarios:
  x86_64:
    qubesos-*-templates-x86_64:
    - system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui
    - system_tests_qrexec
    - system_tests_audio
    - system_tests_network
    - system_tests_network_ipv6
    - system_tests_network_updates
    - system_tests_backup

    - system_tests_extra

defaults:
  x86_64:
    machine: 64bit
    priority: 50
products:
  qubesos-*-qubes-whonix-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: qubes-whonix
    version: '*'
scenarios:
  x86_64:
    qubesos-*-qubes-whonix-x86_64:
    - system_tests_update:
        priority: 10
    - system_tests_whonix
    - system_tests_suspend

defaults:
  x86_64:
    machine: 64bit
    priority: 50
products:
  qubesos-*-securedrop-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: securedrop
    version: '*'
scenarios:
  x86_64:
    qubesos-*-securedrop-x86_64:
    - securedrop_install
    - securedrop_test_dom0
    - securedrop_test_gui

defaults:
  x86_64:
    machine: 64bit
    priority: 50
products:
  qubesos-*-kernel-x86_64:
    distri: qubesos
    flavor: kernel
    version: '*'
scenarios:
  x86_64:
    qubesos-*-kernel-x86_64:
    - system_tests_network
    - system_tests_update:
        priority: 10
        settings:
          # always start with the stable kernel, will be updated anyway
          HDD_1: disk_unencrypted_%VERSION%_%MACHINE%_stable.qcow2
    - system_tests_suspend:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_gui_interactive:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_guivm_gui_interactive:
        priority: 40
    - system_tests_network_updates
    - install_default_upload:
        machine: hw1
        priority: 60
        settings:
          ISO: Qubes-%VERSION%-stable.iso
          HDD_1: ""
    - system_tests_update:
        machine: hw1
        priority: 10
        settings:
          START_DIRECTLY_AFTER_TEST: install_default_upload
          HDD_1: disk_default_%VERSION%_%MACHINE%.qcow2

TestSuites.description: basic tests on BTRFS filesystem (reflink pool)
TestSuites.name: system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_btrfs

TestSuites.description: basic tests on ext4 filesystem (file pool)
TestSuites.name: system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_ext4

TestSuites.description: Default installation, preserve disk for further tests
TestSuites.name: install_default_upload

TestSuites.description: basic tests on ZFS filesystem (zfs pool)
TestSuites.name: system_tests_basic_vm_qrexec_gui_zfs

TestSuites.description: Basic installation and interaction with KDE
TestSuites.name: system_tests_kde_gui_interactive

TestSuites.description: QWT test on Windows 10 with GUI seamless mode
TestSuites.name: system_tests_qwt_win10_seamless
